description: On Tuesday, WikiLeaks, the organisation behind the Edward Snowden leaks, released files going into detail about the CIA's hacking capabilities.
title: Wikileaks publishes files on CIA hacking abilities

description: U.S. Attorney General Jeff Sessions recused himself from any investigation of Russia's alleged interference in the 2016 U.S. presidential race but reserved the right to make decisions "on a case-by-case basis" about other issues involving Russian hacking.
title: U.S. Attorney General Jeff Sessions bows out of Russia investigation over contact with ambassador

description: In a study that appeared on Monday in
title: Scientists say excess cerebrospinal fluid may serve as early sign of autism

description: On Monday, U.S. president Donald Trump signed in the Oval Office a revised version of his executive order barring entry to the United States by refugees and individuals from certain Muslim-majority countries.
title: Travel ban 2.0 exempts Iraqis, U.S. permanent residents
